SELECT s.saving_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY s.fin_category_id ORDER BY s.max_prime_rate) AS saving_rank, s.bank_id, s.saving_name, s.dcls_strt_day, s.join_deny, s.join_member, s.fin_category_id, s.join_way, s.mtrt_int, s.etc_note, s.max_prime_rate, b.bank_name, b.bank_logo_url, b.bank_url, ir.intr_rate_id, ir.intr_rate_type, ir.save_term, ir.intr_rate, ir.intr_rate2, pr.prime_rate_id, pr.prime_rate_percent, pr.prime_rate_detail
FROM savings_products AS s INNER JOIN banks AS b ON s.bank_id = b.bank_id LEFT JOIN saving_interest_rates AS ir ON s.saving_id = ir.saving_id LEFT JOIN saving_prime_Rates AS pr ON s.saving_id = pr.saving_id WHERE s.fin_category_id = #{finCategoryId} AND s.saving_id = #{savingId} ORDER BY s.max_prime_rate DESC;

SELECT s.saving_id, s.bank_id, s.saving_name, s.dcls_strt_day, s.join_deny, s.join_member, s.fin_category_id, s.join_way, s.mtrt_int, s.etc_note, s.max_prime_rate, b.bank_id, b.bank_logo_url, b.bank_url, MIN(sir.intr_rate2) AS intr_rate2, b.bank_name, MIN(sir.intr_rate_type) AS intr_rate_type, MIN(sir.save_term) AS save_term FROM savings_products s JOIN saving_interest_rates sir ON s.saving_id = sir.saving_id JOIN banks b ON s.bank_id = b.bank_id WHERE s.fin_category_id = 1 GROUP BY s.saving_id ORDER BY intr_rate2 DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT s.saving_id, s.bank_id, s.saving_name, s.dcls_strt_day, s.join_deny, s.join_member, s.fin_category_id, s.join_way, s.mtrt_int, s.etc_note, s.max_prime_rate, MIN(sir.intr_rate2) AS intr_rate2, b.bank_name, MIN(sir.intr_rate_type) AS intr_rate_type, MIN(sir.save_term) AS save_term FROM savings_products s JOIN saving_interest_rates sir ON s.saving_id = sir.saving_id JOIN banks b ON s.bank_id = b.bank_id WHERE s.fin_category_id = 2 GROUP BY s.saving_id ORDER BY intr_rate2 DESC LIMIT 3;
